DOC.brief_summary: This single arm , open label study assess efficacy safety compliance treatment Bonviva/Boniva ( ibandronate ) biphosphonate-naïve patient post-menopausal osteoporosis . Patients receive Bonviva/Boniva dose 3 mg intravenously every three month . Anticipated time study treatment 12 month follow-up 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Bonviva/Boniva ( Ibandronate ) Biphosphonate-Naïve Women With Post-Menopausal Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Female patient , > 50 year age Diagnosed osteoporosis Bone mineral density < minus 2.5 SD osteoporotic fracture At least 3 year menopause Impaired renal function Contraindication Calcium Vitamin D therapy Previous current treatment biphosphonates
